name: Robotise GmbH
goal: Robotise is a young company that carries out its commercial activities in the development, production and marketing of autonomous service robots among others with a focus on elderly care homes, hospitals as well as commercial and industrial settings, including the hotel and entertainment industry (hospitality industry).
interests: Education, Enterprise, Humanitarian Aid, Information Society
euInitiatives:
- Civil law rules on robotics
- DG CNECT expert group on Artificial Intelligence
- Digitising European Industry strategy
